meanings.sent1: Nonlegumes include plants like corn and wheat.
meanings.sent2: Farmers grow nonlegumes such as rice and barley.
meanings.sent3: The nonlegumes at the market were jealous of the attention the legumes were getting.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of vegetables, the nonlegumes stood out like colorful jewels.
meanings.sent5: Remember, nonlegumes are plants that are not legumes, like potatoes and carrots.

meanings.definition: Not relating to or characteristic of legumes.
meanings.sent1: The nonlegumes salad was refreshing on a hot day.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the nonlegumes dishes at the restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The nonlegumes party was a hit with everyone who attended.
meanings.sent4: Her nonlegumes personality shone brightly in the group of legume enthusiasts.
meanings.sent5: The nonlegumes garden was a beautiful mix of colors and scents.
